components.name: Storage and Backups || Cloud Disk Array

incident_updates.body: Ongoing actions : the problem is corrected normally but the situation is being monitored. We will provide updates soon.
Update : Our teams re-scheduled the fix of 21/03/2022 to the 23/03/2022. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.
Update : We plan to deploy a fix the 21/03 in order to fix the remaining cases
Update : Our technical teams continue to work on the incident. We fixed most references impacted, we're still working on the remaining cases.

Update :Our technical teams continue to work on the incident. To date they have identified software dependencies that lead to the discovery of new bugs when fixing an identified bug. The teams are currently working to identify all the bugs present
Update :Our technical teams have deployed a patch this afternoon allowing access to the servers from the manager. We continue to work to resolve the situation permanently
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are still working on a solution that will help us resolve this incident. We will get back to you as soon as possible.
UPDATE: A maintenance was performed to fix the API bug, we have encountered a new bug. A new Change will be programmed by our technical team that will enable us  fix the incident.
Ongoing actions : Our teams scheduled a maintenance to solve the problem on the 09/02/2022 at 08:30 UTC that will last 15 minutes. Thank you for your understanding.

UPDATE: A change/maintenance has been programmed by our technical team which will enable us to fix the incident and get the service working again.
We apologize for any inconvienience caused.

Start time : 24/01/2022 09:36 UTC Service impact : Some customers are unable to access the panel of their dedicated servers in the manager Root cause : The incident is due to an error in the API code. Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on a fix to correct the incident

Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

scheduled_maintenances.name: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life

incident_updates.body: Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service. OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date. Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date. --------------------------------------------------- Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service. OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date. Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.
